import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import Home from "./Home"; import './App.css'; import Navigation from './Navigation'; import axios from 'axios'; const AddPurchase = () => { const [order, setOrder] = useState({name: "", lastName:"", country:"", city:"" , service:"", price: "", purchaseDate: ""}) const handleChange = (event) => { console.log(event) const {name,value} = event.target } const clickSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(event) order = { name, lastName, country, city, service, price, purchaseDate } setOrder({...order, error: false}) console.log(order) axios.post('http://localhost:3001/createOrder', order) .then(data => { if(data.error) { setOrder({...order, error: data.error, success:false}) console.log(data.error) } }) setOrder({ ...order, name:'', country:'', city:'', service: '', price:'', purchaseDate:'', error: '', success:true, }); }; return (
) } export default AddPurchase;
